metadata.name: Less Broken Mineshaft
metadata.description:
Walking down the mineshaft to get to Knife Piece 2 is boring. Now, you can ride the minecart all the way in. You'll still have to fight your way out.
Note: you can skip the minecart ride by bombing your way in.
Support for the following mods has been added: [list] [*]Fall from Grace (Grotto) [*]Fiend Folio Reheated (mineshaft rooms) [/list]
Other mods that add mineshaft rooms that don't have direct support right now (e.g. Rooms Galore) shouldn't cause any issues. Those rooms will be skipped.
This mod requires REPENTOGON.
